credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 97 x 11.5 cm (38 3/16 x 4 1/2 in.)
title: Fragment
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: plain weave with a set of supplementary warps (orange) and discontinuous supplementary wefts (silks and metallics) bound on the front in 1/3 twill
description: Long narrow fragment from the right side of a pattern which had a ship at sea and bold vegetation in bright colors and metallic thread.
name: Fragment
